articles.title: Donald Detox

articles.altText: Burst gradient of blue into black with the words Liberal Orchard The poison of populism written in the middle with a matrix behind it

articles.title: Liberal Orchard's 2024 Polling Average
articles.description: People are complex, models should be simple. So we made one and cut the bs.
articles.author: Liberal Orchard
articles.altText: A picture of the statue of liberty and an American flag with text in front of it that reads out Liberal Orchard and below that a black arrow pointing right with a text overlay that says 2024 election.
